root.name: Rugrats: I Gotta Go Party
root.description: OverviewThe Rugrats are playing hide-and-seek in the house, and it is up to the player to find them. Doing so opens up several different minigames: cookie (and worm) catching, racing, and puzzle solving are featured in the gamut.Contrary to advertisement of "hours and hours" of gameplay, Rugrats: I Gotta Go Party can probably be beaten in less than an hour.
